channel.title: Steam is f***ed up.
channel.description:
Right, Steam has been crashing a lot recently, So I reinstalled it. But now It just says in the Updating Steam window, Cannot Contact the Steam Network. Try again later.
Any suggestions?
Thanks guys.

item.title: Steam is f***ed up.
item.dc:creator: _amp_955_dam
item.description:
It’s working now…
I just reinstalled it again.

Jeez. I never want to experience that again.

Oh well. Thanks for helping guys.

Read full topic

item.title: Steam is f***ed up.
item.dc:creator: Metritutus
item.description:
Never seen that before. Normally it gives you a ‘start in offline mode or retry connection’ box when it cannot connect.

item.title: Steam is f***ed up.
item.dc:creator: _amp_955_dam
item.description:
Metritutus:

What is your firewall? Do you have any torrent applications (such as Utorrent) running in the background?

What is your operating system?

I just use the default Windows Firewall.
No torrent applications running.
Windows Vista Ultimate.

I don’t understand the problem as everything was the same earlier.

Raminator:

Try again later. :3

Oh yeah. I’ll try that. :freeman:
It happened 2 hours ago…

Read full topic

item.title: Steam is f***ed up.

item.description:
λdam:

Right, Steam has been crashing a lot recently, So I reinstalled it. But now It just says in the Updating Steam window, Cannot Connect to Steam Servers. Please try again later.

Any suggestions?

Thanks guys.

What is your firewall? Do you have any torrent applications (such as Utorrent) running in the background?

What is your operating system?
